articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: OpenAI has a new safety team — it's run by Sam Altman - The Verge
articles.description: Following the departure of several key AI researchers, OpenAI announced that it’s forming a new safety committee led by CEO Sam Altman.
articles.content:
OpenAI has a new safety team its run by Sam Altman
OpenAI has a new safety team its run by Sam Altman
 / With three OpenAI board members on the new safety team, will it really be so safe?
ByEmma R… [+2433 chars]
